    • app.Application

    java.io.Serializable

    public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Author:
    Daniel Santo-Tomas daniel.santo-tomas@estudiante.uam.es, Lucia Rivas Molina lucia.rivas@estudiante.uam.es
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Application​(java.lang.String name)
      Sets the name of the application and if it's the first time that someone creates that app, it creates the user list (readed from file) and the admin user.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Application

        public Application​(java.lang.String name)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets the name of the application and if it's the first time that someone creates that app, it creates the user list (readed from file) and the admin user. Otherwise, reads the saved app and restores the values it had the last time someone created it.
        Parameters:
        name -
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        zipcode -
        Returns:
        true if the house is created correctly, false otherwise
        Throws:

        Throws:
        NotRegisteredUser - if the user who tries to search is not registered

      • searchRate

        public java.util.List<Offer> searchRate​(double rate)
                                 throws NotRegisteredUser
        Search in the app offer list the ones that have the rate given or more
        Parameters:
        rate -
        Returns:
        a list of avoffers with an average rate equal or higher than the rate given
        Throws:
        NotRegisteredUser - if the user who tries to search is not registered

      • login

        public java.lang.Boolean login​(java.lang.String NIF,
                               java.lang.String password)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Logs the user with the password and NIF given in the app. Also checks that the offers asked for changes and the reserves are still on date to be changed(offers9 or paid(reserves) Then logs the user in
        Parameters:
        NIF - of the user
        password - of the user
        Returns:
        true if the user logs in, false otherwise
        Throws:
        InvalidNIF - if there is an user in the file with the same NIF that another user
        NotRegisteredUser - if a user that it's not in the users list tries to log in
        java.lang.Exception

      • logout

        public java.lang.Boolean logout​()
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Logs the user out of the app, saving the state of the app in an .objectData
        Returns:
        true if everything is correct, false otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • createOffer

        public java.lang.Boolean createOffer​(House house,
                                     java.time.LocalDate iniDate,
                                     int numMonths,
                                     int price,
                                     int deposit)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a Living offer, adding it to the waiting for review list of the app and to the house offers list
        Parameters:
        house - :the house of the offer
        iniDate - : date when the offer begins
        numMonths - : number of months of the offer
        price - :price per month of the offer
        Returns:
        true if everything is correct, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NotHost - if an user who is not a host tries to create an offer
        NotOwner - if a host tries to create an offer on a house that doesn't belong to him
        HouseOfferException - if the house already has an offer of that type
        java.lang.Exception

      • createOffer

        public java.lang.Boolean createOffer​(House house,
                                     java.time.LocalDate iniDate,
                                     java.time.LocalDate endDate,
                                     int price,
                                     int deposit)
                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a Holiday offer, adding it to the waiting for review list of the app and to the house offers list
        Parameters:
        house - :the house of the offer
        iniDate - : date when the offer begins
        endDate - : date when the offer ends
        price - :price of the hole holiday
        Returns:
        true if everything is correct, false otherwise
        Throws:
        NotHost - if an user who is not a host tries to create an offer
        NotOwner - if a host tries to create an offer on a house that doesn't belong to him
        HouseOfferException - if the house already has an offer of that type
        java.lang.Exception
